analyzed: vividha citra tala maddasam su ramma

original: Bhāti ca dasa disā nabheva suriyo,
analyzed: bhāti ca dasa disā nabhā iva suriyaḥ
iddham inda puram yathā tava īda

udakaruhā ca yā itthi puppha jātā
